website_summaries.verdict: Aside from a few quirks, this brand is synonymous with both fashion and weather-resistant wear, and these boots are a durable, mid-priced pair.
pros: In addition to their sturdy leather construction with waterproof coating and warm Thinsulate lining, these London Fog boots sport a fashionable look that works with winter fashions
cons: Feels a bit bulky and heavy on the foot
Some men may have to go down a half size, as they tend to run wide
Some issues with stitch unraveling reported

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: These boots are not worth the money they have been poorly put together, I thought they would be great but they are splitting in the back. I will not buy any shoes from London Fog anymore
customer_reviews.author: Sean Calhoun

customer_reviews.title: Great boot. Recently went to Canada on my first ...
customer_reviews.text: Great boot. Recently went to Canada on my first ever snow trip. Wore these the entire time and they fit perfect and were very comfortable right out of the box. We walked all over the ski village and trekked through plenty of snow and no issue with water getting in or feet getting cold. Just to clarify I wasn't walking through the back country just walking though the ski town and walking in snow that was just a few inches deep and for that purpose they were great. Also didn't have any issues with them slipping on ice, will be using them again next season.
customer_reviews.author: Brutus

customer_reviews.title: Quack
customer_reviews.text: I was desperately searching for a pair of affordable and hopefully sturdy duck books. Given the reviews and previous London Fog products I gave these a shot. So far they are very warm and have kept my feet warm and dry and have held up to daily use. The 3M insulation is fantastic and dries rather quickly as well. My one concern is the quality of leather and stitching but time will decide that. Overall a great boot at a price that can't be beat (I got them for under $30)
customer_reviews.author: Rob Goblin

customer_reviews.title: Tough and Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome. I don't need winter boots in Florida, but I travel a lot. Currently wearing them in Montreal where I came for New Year's. I'm walking all over the city for hours at a time and they've kept my feet warm and dry. They are soft inside and rugged outside. I'm very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Boots
customer_reviews.text: I brought this boots to work outside. Since then I’ve worn them on several hiking trails covered in snow and rain. My feet stayed dry and comfy. I have $300 hiking boots that would of been soaked on those trails. I will be buying anything pair
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable.  No half sizes.
customer_reviews.text: I was worried at first about the lack of half sizes. I wear a 9.5 and under the advice of other reviewers ordered the 9. It was snug at first but quickly became roomy. That should have been my first indication that the fit wasn't going to be good. The insoles quickly developed balls of material all over them. If I try to walk any real distance in these the bottoms of my feet hurt. So far the only good thing is that they keep the water out. They also keep sweat in, so you have to put them by a fan or heat source to dry after wearing them or they develop an odor.
customer_reviews.author: J. Carter

customer_reviews.title: Warm but cheap
customer_reviews.text: Boots are cheap and the insole is about as thin as a piece of paper. If you want a boot that makes you look like a chad for half the cost of LL bean then get these. If not then do the right thing and buy Georgia boots that actually function and don't cause me to slip all over wet grounds. They are really warm though! thats for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Chazin

customer_reviews.title: Very heavy and wide boots
customer_reviews.text: I received these and immediately tried them on as I didn't know how they would fit. They are snug in the toe area as they only come in whole sizes. That was ok but the problem is how wide they are. They didn't have much foot structure to them and just overall didn't look good. If you have wide feet, these will probably great for you but if not, they are not the boots for you.
customer_reviews.author: Dyoshida23

customer_reviews.title: My husband was extremely happy with his gift
customer_reviews.text: My husband was extremely happy with his gift! I was naturally worried about the fit bc obviously he wasn't trying them on before purchasing, but they fit perfect to his size! They keep his feet dry and he's ready to shovel the New England snow!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great boot great price
customer_reviews.text: Great boot at a very reasonable price. I wear a 10 usually, sometimes a 10.5 so ordered the 10. Fit is good - perfect for my slightly smaller foot and Ok for the slightly larger foot. I like the width - feels comfortable but not sloppy for me. I've tried on many of the standard popular brands and this one fits best and costs less. Feels substantial and very stable walking. I have no complaints. High quality boot, attractive, fits true to size and a bargain for the price charged.
customer_reviews.author: stephen boyd

customer_reviews.title: Not what i expected
customer_reviews.text: I bought these following a name of quality. Within 2 months the tops where it creases at your toes when squatting started to crack and fall apart letting in large amounts of water not only moisture.. I don't think I'll be purchasing these again I was extremely dissapoint3d
customer_reviews.author: Lucas

customer_reviews.title: These boots are fantastic. I live in Boston so I got to ...
customer_reviews.text: These boots are fantastic. I live in Boston so I got to really try them out today while I was outside shoveling for about three hours. My feet stayed dry and warm the entire time. They are great and a very reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: jd

customer_reviews.title: Sloppy on the details
customer_reviews.text: True to size and great for wide feet too. My husband says they’re very comfortable and seem like good quality, but we haven’t gotten to test them. I’d have to say I’m disappointed in the craftsmanship, though. The rubber border that goes around the top of the rubber portion and next to the leather upper is a bit wavy like someone went very fast. The bottom of the boot has a crooked # stamp. Not sure if that’s a machine but a little more care could be given on seemingly little things.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Sold duck boot at great price!
customer_reviews.text: Fits true to size. I had a chance to use them in this unusually cold wet weather we’ve had down south. They work great and keep my feet nice and toasty! I love the all black since all you usually see in the duck boot is the brown green combo. Thanks for a great product at a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Squishy and not a real boot
customer_reviews.text: These boots are squishy like house slippers. They feel like they are made of soft foam rubber. Not like a real shoe, let alone a real solid boot. You can also feel the shape of every bump and ridge that you step on through the squishy rubber soles. I returned them immediately and paid more for some solid boots that I am happy with.
customer_reviews.author: DynamicDuo

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I somehow got these for $10!? And for that Price I really can’t complain about anything. They keep my feet warm and dry and fit nicely. However, I wouldn’t pay the $75 they are normally listed for. They have a thin sole so you can feel every stone you step on. They have very little structure which makes them squash out wide when you walk and have no foot support - I’ve been needing to buy insoles which I think will make them much more comfortable to walk in
customer_reviews.author: Gena

customer_reviews.title: Husband Loves these boots!
customer_reviews.text: My husband wanted a pair of rain/snow boots because his feet were always getting wet and cold when it rained. I purchased these for him and he loves them! I purchased his shoe size 13's and he said they fit just right. He wasn't used to the insert. They send a cushion insert for the boots. He said it felt a bit funny, but walked around a while and then they felt fine. So all in all, this purchase was a win!
customer_reviews.author: ypwf

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Had bought these boots as a gift, worked well at first.. barely a month later the bottoms of the boots are full of holes and no longer can be worn. Was very disappointed to see there was no way to get a replacement for defective boots. Boots like these should last more than a month.
customer_reviews.author: shyla

customer_reviews.title: The Boot is Pure Butter
customer_reviews.text: Super solid stylish boot, although I’m still waiting for it to rain so I can really put em to the test 🌧 ☔️ Update: okay it rained... alot, and the boots 🥾 kept my feet🦶🏼and socks 🧦 super dry even tho I walked right through puddles of deep water💧I really like the boots, the only thing to watch out for, however, is that they can get a little slippery wherever there’s non-porous tile. Gotta make sure to wipe/dry your boots on a mat before walking into a spot with semi-glossy to glossy tile surface.
customer_reviews.author: 🌟 tHReE rabBiT 💫

customer_reviews.title: Look good, not too heavy.
customer_reviews.text: I wear a 10.5 so I ordered up to an 11. They are still a bit bigger than what I expected but not enough to make them uncomfortable. Factor in that during cold weather I will be wearing much thicker socks and these boots are going to be great. Nice and comfy and very warm.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey David Gignac

customer_reviews.title: Lasted one year
customer_reviews.text: These boots were great while they lasted. Warm, waterproof up to the laces. Perfect for cold, soggy walks with the dog. Then they both fell apart at almost the same time after about 1 year of use. Both of them cracked in the rubber waterproof section, and the loops to help you pull them on both ripped off. Now they're kinda worthless. I'd expect them to last longer, its not like I wore them all day every day. I have several pair of Baffins that have lasted me over 10 years but I guess you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: J. Fife

customer_reviews.title: Christmas present
customer_reviews.text: Our son just loves the boots they were going to be a Christmas present but since it snowed and his job he got them early and said they were perfect and fit great.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma Rose

customer_reviews.title: Love these boots
customer_reviews.text: I searched a while to find this type of boot and glad I made this selection in lieu of the more expensive brands. I tested them today - 14 degrees with 4 inches of snow and am happy to report they were great. I not sure of their longevity but I would recommend these boots.
customer_reviews.author: Sean@216

customer_reviews.title: He said he liked them and I've not heard any complaints
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son he picked them out. He said he liked them and I've not heard any complaints, they look great. Exactly as pictured. A bit pricey but that's just the London Fog and you get what you pay for. Their well built and sturdy boots. I'd recommend them to anyone looking for good rain/snow boots. He's a college student so they work for him on campus in the rain and on snowy days. He says they are warm and keep his feet and bottom of his pants dry.
customer_reviews.author: help me

customer_reviews.title: He said they are perfect in terms of width
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I have a car detailing business. He uses these to keep his feet from getting wet/cold/etc. He LOVES them. He said they are perfect in terms of width, but you may need to add an insole because they are tall. What I mean is the height within the front of the boot is tall. He put in an insole and says they are perfect now. He's even used them for snow and rainy days. They are his go-to shoe now. :)
customer_reviews.author: M. Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Great boots
customer_reviews.text: It's Buffalo, cold and wet. I work outside all winter and my feet are now warm and dry. They are well constructed and seem to be very durable. I have already recommend them to several people.
customer_reviews.author: Brotherarmada

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Pretty hard to beat for the price. They are incredibly functional and do their job. It’s rained so much this fall and way better to slip on they my pair of heavy red wing work boots from a decade ago. If you’re comparing the look of these to the classic companies, they don’t look as good but they are so affordable that this is a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Travis

customer_reviews.title: Warm boots
customer_reviews.text: Warm boots, but fit very large. Bought the size of footwear I have worn for years. Even with two pairs of socks due to the cold, boots were too large.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: size may run a little small
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear men's size 9 1/2 or 10 - ordered size 10 arrived in three days free standard shipping, but they were too small - my toes were touching the end of the boot. Completed the super simple return process and ordered size 11 they too arrived in 3 days and this time a perfect fit. Just in time for a week of single digit temperature and they passed with flying colors.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth J. Bracken

customer_reviews.title: Good price and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This is the first duck boot I've ever owned and i bought them online so I didn't know what to expect. I really liked the color i chose as opposed to the standard blue and tan you usually see. They are a little wider and bulkier than I'm used to, but that might be standard for duck boots. They are very warm and comfortable, but will need to be broken in some for flexibility.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Barham

customer_reviews.title: I can brave any storm
customer_reviews.text: These boots are definitely water tight. They also feel pretty nice. I am size 14, bought size 14 and they fit well. The only minor nitpicking thing I can say is that the heels feel a little low or small. My plan is to wear these every day on a 9 day trip to Ireland. So far, I can say that I believe they will do well. Hopefully I can update this review after my trip.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Lane Fuller

customer_reviews.title: Great for dog walking!
customer_reviews.text: My husband was looking for a good pair of boots and remembered how much he liked “Duck” boots a long time ago. So I looked these up and he’s really happy with them. They’re very comfortable and keep his feet dry. Our dog loves to go for walks even in the snow and these boots make it easier.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Winter is Here.
customer_reviews.text: These boots seem well made and fit as sized. I normally use Sorel for most of my winter boots, but I'm building a Pole Barn and didn't t want to damage such an expensive boot. These London fog boots are priced right and are holding up so far. They are light weight and warm, so I ordered a second pair to wear town.
customer_reviews.author: trustbverify

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Fairly comfortable but a bit heavier than expected. Toe area so wide it makes it difficult to drive. Toe hits both gas and brakes if not careful. Over all I don’t know of a better winter boot in this price range.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Warm
customer_reviews.text: These boots are excellent for rain/snow. The boot itself is well made and nice n warm inside. The only thing I noticed was if you’re working on a rocky surface or any surface that is a little choppy you’ll feel it in these boots. Overall though great pair of boots
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Kept my feet dry and warm.
customer_reviews.text: Kept my feet dry and warm. Which is the primary objective. Plus it don’t look bad at all. Love it. Minor complaint. Laces kept getting undone though. Hmmmm. Need to get new laces?
customer_reviews.author: Alex T. King

customer_reviews.title: They are very comfortable. I will recommend them and will buy them ...
customer_reviews.text: They are true to the size, wide enough, linings are soft and seemingly durable. I tried on today when it was raining. They are very comfortable. I will recommend them and will buy them again when those time shall be due:)
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Money!
customer_reviews.text: London Fog has always had a great reputation in my book. The boots were for my 12 year old son. I bought a size 10 and they fit as expected. They fit his narrow foot comfortably. They are good quality boots worth every penny I spent.
customer_reviews.author: Kandy

customer_reviews.title: It's sad because otherwise it's totally worth the$70
customer_reviews.text: After wearing the boots a total of two times, the back strap pulled away from the left boot. It's sad because otherwise it's totally worth the$70.
customer_reviews.author: Jevon Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof & comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: The brown is a little darker than picture but that was alright. We have had rain the past 2 weeks and he said they work well out in it. So he's pleased; therefore I'm pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Lady Dee

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable - so far so good.
customer_reviews.text: Stylish and no leaking as long as water stays below the upper...
customer_reviews.author: Klaus

customer_reviews.title: Great boot, but heavy on the floor
customer_reviews.text: Really great boot. Have gone through so many pairs over the years at this price point and they've all been a disappointment. These are sturdy and warm. Giving 4 stars because they are very heavy
customer_reviews.author: Zhivago3

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Christmas gift for husband, he’s been wearing them every day since. We’ve had a lot of snow here lately - boots definitely stand up well to wet, snowy, slushy conditions - great for sledding too :)
customer_reviews.author: H. M.

customer_reviews.title: Very Bulky
customer_reviews.text: The good: They are warm and waterproof The bad: The sizes run pretty big and they are very bulky shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Robert C.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly the boots i  was looking for!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've worn these all this winterwith snow, rain, slush and all winter in the north east has to offer and they have been great with very little signs of wear. Very warm and dry and i must say they are pretty light weight. I'm really happy with their performance .. Highly recommend...
customer_reviews.author: D & A Jones

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: my partners review of the mens boots -" super stoked with these boots, wore them in knee deep snow and -16 degree Celsius temperate fit stayed warm and dry the entire time, highly recommend."
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Spicer

customer_reviews.title: Good snowboot
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my son. He wore them in the snow to shovel the walkways etc. He said they were warm, snug fit (he has a narrow foot), comfortable and kept his feet dry.
customer_reviews.author: L. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful boots. I had about given up buying clothing ...
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful boots. I had about given up buying clothing by "mail" but glad I went for these. Would not have bought them at the list price, but am so thankful I saw my size on sale just as my old ones sprang a leak!
customer_reviews.author: OldBadger31

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, warm, and waterproof boots!! They are more chunky looking and look more like a snow boot rather than a more casual boot. At first I wasn't sure I liked that, but after trying on more casual duck boots, these were hands down the most comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Whalen

customer_reviews.title: Great for snow!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these to wear while shoveling and clearing off snow with our ATV. These boots fit well (I wear a 12 and I ordered a 13 because of thick socks) and keep the tootsies warm and dry.
customer_reviews.author: LBell

customer_reviews.title: Good boot, lacks arch support
customer_reviews.text: Nice boot for the price, but wish they had at least a little more support in the arch
customer_reviews.author: John C.

customer_reviews.title: quality boot
customer_reviews.text: The first thing I did was show my wife the boots because I was happy about the quality appearance. The boots fit a perfect size 11. The insulation is good enough for shoveling the drive and a walk to the grocery store on a cold day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great boot, except one of the pulls on the ...
customer_reviews.text: Great boot, except one of the pulls on the back broke within a few weeks, so am unable to use that to help pull them on. Otherwise they are great.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Lamb

customer_reviews.title: Great for COLD weather!
customer_reviews.text: Was a Christmas gift for my college student son. Great when walking between classes in freezing temps, a little too warm otherwise. He’s happy I’m happy!
customer_reviews.author: Twinraiser

customer_reviews.title: Water proof/Snow proof
customer_reviews.text: I love my new pair. The insulation is great, the fit is right and it sure is waterproof. I’ve never been a fan of duck boots but these are wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: JUSTCHILL3N

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan
customer_reviews.text: Not a great fit for my husband they were very bulky and cheap material.
customer_reviews.author: Ashlee Hardin

customer_reviews.title: Good value and looking
customer_reviews.text: Thesse boots wear a little big but are very comfortable for adding a pair of thick socks. They are very nice looking and fashionable.
customer_reviews.author: FREDRICK LOCKHART

customer_reviews.title: Great boots
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves his boots- they are perfect for Upstate New York lake living.
customer_reviews.author: Anneabelle007

customer_reviews.title: Heel pull on strap not sturdy:(
customer_reviews.text: The leather loop on the back came off after only one week wearing the shoes. Now there’s just a strap hanging there.
customer_reviews.author: Crysta

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these. He has only used them a handful of times but he says they are comfortable and they keep his feet warm and dry
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My husband loved these boots. When they arrived he put them on and even wears them whenever he get the chance. He talks about how warm and comfortable they are. I am even thinking about purchasing me a pair.
customer_reviews.author: LadieKrissi

customer_reviews.title: Great snowy weather shoes
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my southern-all-his-life son when he moved up north for school. He says they are warm, comfortable, fit well, and he gets complimented on their appearance. He wears them nearly every day. Commutes to work and class by bike and on foot and they still look nearly new at the end of the season.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Quave

customer_reviews.title: It's pretty heavy but not as heavy as timbs
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty heavy but not as heavy as timbs. I really like how they look. In my opinion, it looks better than the Sperry's. Thinsulate means that it really starts to get warm. Definitely not for casual wear. These ARE winter boots. For winter storms.
customer_reviews.author: Nana Dadzie

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: Good solid feeling boot. Plowed snow covered driveway in them and they were perfect for the job.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: They are the perfect cold weather boot. The sizing is appropriate and the price isn’t outrageous. You get a quality boot that is comfortable. My husband has never worn cold weather boots before and now he wears them every time he can.
customer_reviews.author: Beckie Jones

customer_reviews.title: feel good on the feet
customer_reviews.text: the boots seem like they are quality made. They feel nice on my feet and soft as well. Time will tell how they hold up
customer_reviews.author: Rich King

customer_reviews.title: Great boots, definitely buy!
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my boyfriend on our Colorado trip and he loved them! They were super comfy and he said they kept his feet very warm! Great grip as well.
customer_reviews.author: AshFerg 1

customer_reviews.title: Withstood the first trip
customer_reviews.text: So far my husband is glad he got these boots. We took them on a trip and he walked on the ice and in some snow with them and had dry and warm feet, so he was happy. They seem like a generous size 13.
customer_reviews.author: C. Nason

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: Economically priced but returned because they are bulky, flimsy, and clunky looking. They mushroom out when walking in them. Seems as if they would be ok functionally for cold and wet but thats where the pros end.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great for Winter in Syracuse
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking, warm & waterproof. Why would I pay more when London Fog makes all you need with a beautiful presentation. Best winter boots I've owned so far.
customer_reviews.author: shyla

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Husband loved them and said they were warm after he went sledding and shoveled the driveway
customer_reviews.author: Ashley J

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Motorcycle Boot!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for hubby for Christmas. He loves them! He says they look good, are comfy, and keep his feet warm and dry when riding his motorcycle.
customer_reviews.author: DPBgirl

customer_reviews.title: They fit well!
customer_reviews.text: My husband has not worn these shoes yet, but they fit well and were shipped out fast!
customer_reviews.author: Mandolyn Ward

customer_reviews.title: A QUALITY PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: Nice materials, quality workmanship and fits as expected. Great for hiking as well as protection from snow and ice during the winter months.
customer_reviews.author: richard e whitelockTop Contributor: Children's Books

customer_reviews.title: Great boots
customer_reviews.text: Bought these on Amazon because I couldn’t see paying a ton for other, more expensive named brands. So, knowing the tradition of London Fog, I went in. The boots are super comfortable and well worth the value. I’m honestly surprised these aren’t priced as steep as L.l Beans. I wear a size 12, and they’re a perfect fit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: JUST WHAT YOU NEED FOR WINTER AND NOT AT AN ABSORBANDENT PRICE.
customer_reviews.author: NOELVM

customer_reviews.title: Very warm
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about the boot. Very warm liner inside. Very stylish. Only issue is that the boot flattens out when feet are in them. Gives the image of a bigger foot than the size.
customer_reviews.author: David W. Roach

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to keep my feet dry on the days it rains during practice and love them!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Kirkland III

customer_reviews.title: Cozy boots
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots Only had them for 2 days so don't know how long they will last They fit great and are warm and comfortable though
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: Water seeps inside immediately on walking in snow. Not suitable where there is heavy snowfall. I am returning the shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Santanu B.

customer_reviews.title: great rainboot
customer_reviews.text: already used them in hard rain and they worked as they were supposed to. they kept my feet dry and warm and were comfortable to wear all day long. great boot.
customer_reviews.author: daniel r

customer_reviews.title: Oh yeah!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these for my husband, he loves them... totally waterproof, warm and very comfortable...price was great...
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Yow

customer_reviews.title: boots felt too poorly made
customer_reviews.text: boots felt very cheaply made. fake leather, cushions very stiff with a very thin and uncomfortable insole.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Warm, dry feet! Very important!
customer_reviews.text: The boots were fine and fit good especially with thick socks.
customer_reviews.author: msqure

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, waterproof and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, waterproof and sturdy. They fit the purpose. They keep my feet dry whilst working in the yard doing my honey-dos. That's about it, thank you.
customer_reviews.author: LaMische

customer_reviews.title: Normally a 9.5, had to order a 10
customer_reviews.text: Quality made. Since no half sizes a 10 was slightly large.
customer_reviews.author: Zondur07

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: My fiance loves these boots. They are exactly what he wanted. Thank you so much
customer_reviews.author: BookwormGirl

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: My husband wears these when he's out in the snow and he loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Jana Olivas

customer_reviews.title: Good product, great price
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the fit and comfort. Would absolutely purchase again. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Robert S.

customer_reviews.title: Good boot
customer_reviews.text: I bought these boots for a trip to Minnesota during the Winter of 2019 . With -12 below temperatures the shoes kept me my feet DRY and WARM with the additional of thermal socks. The grip of the souls was excellent. I had no trouble with slipping or sliding. Iwould buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Dry Feet
customer_reviews.text: Fit well and keeps my feet dry. I wore twice a day walking the dog for the entire winter and a very, very wet spring and had zero problems. Highly recommended and at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: David Chambers

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my husband to do winter farm work and he loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Tory Spurgin

customer_reviews.title: He loves them
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to get my husband a pair of duck boots for the winter weather for a trip out west. These are perfect. He has a wide foot and the shoes fit nicely with a nice pair of socks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy it breaks but the second doesn’t
customer_reviews.text: Our first pair the back pull up tab broke so I requested a replacement but the 2nd pair didn’t break. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Warm & Dry
customer_reviews.text: Finally I have found a out that is waterproof and warm. The insulation was evident when I slipped boot on and began to feel my feet get warm.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory S. Storms

customer_reviews.title: Love em
customer_reviews.text: Love these. Super warm and dry. My only complaint is that the tongue of the one book rubs my shin the wrong way but that seems to be going away the more I wear them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Boots
customer_reviews.text: My husband found them uncomfortable. They looked well made, but we returned them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like this product a little large to all for thick ...
customer_reviews.text: With narrow foot hard to find fitting footwear. I like this product a little large to all for thick socks and swelling of foot.
customer_reviews.author: Alva Kee

customer_reviews.title: Boyfriend loved it! He's about 8-8
customer_reviews.text: Boyfriend loved it! He's about 8-8.5 since he has wide feet. The 8 fit him perfectly and worked well for our snowboarding trip. He had a little bit of difficulty driving with them on, but everything else was great.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy N

customer_reviews.title: Cool looking
customer_reviews.text: Cool looking, minus star because they're not that comfortable at all.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Valcarcel Rivera

product_meta.title: London Fog Mens Ashford Waterproof and Insulated Duck Boot
product_meta.description: Beat the snow and stay warm this winter in these London Fog waterprrof and insulated Snow Boots!! London Fog is one of the oldest and most established U.S. fashion brands. For over 90 years, the brand has embodied a classic metropolitan appeal. Today London Fog is ranked as the #1 recognized brand of outerwear in the United States. London Fog continues to enjoy iconic status.
